Functions

void APL_TaskHandler (void)
INLINE void SYS_PostTask (SYS_TaskId_t taskId)
 Posts a task to the task manager, which is later processed by the task handler of the corresponding stack layer.
INLINE void SYS_DisableTask (SYS_TaskId_t taskId)
 Disables specified task.
INLINE void SYS_EnableTask (SYS_TaskId_t taskId)
 Enables specified task.
bool SYS_RunTask (void)
 This function is called by the stack or from the main() function to process tasks.
void SYS_ForceZsiHandler (void)
 Force PDS handler procedure.

uint16_t SYS_taskMask

Detailed Description

The header file describes the public stack Task Manager interface, task handlers and tasks IDs of Task Manager.

Author:
Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com
Support email: support@microchip.com

Copyright (c) 2018, Microchip Corporation. All rights reserved. Licensed under Mirochip's Limited License Agreement.

Definition in file sysTaskManager.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum SYS_TaskId_t

The list of task IDs. The IDs are sorted according to descending priority. For each task ID there is the corresponding task handler function.

Enumerator:
MAC_PHY_HWD_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the MAC-PHY-HWD layer.

HAL_TASK_ID 

Task ID of HAL (Hardware Abstraction Layer)

MAC_HWI_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the MAC-HWI layer (a part of MAC independent of radio)

NWK_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the NWK layer.

ZDO_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the ZDO layer.

APS_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the APS layer.

ZGP_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the ZGP layer.

SSP_TASK_ID 

Task ID of Security Service Provider.

TC_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the Trust Center component.

BSP_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the Border Support Package layer.

ZSI_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the ZAppSI component.

ZCL_TASK_ID 

Task ID of ZigBee Cluster Library.

ZLL_TASK_ID 

Service Task ID.

APL_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the application.

PDS_TASK_ID 

Task ID of the Persistent Data Server component.

Definition at line 26 of file sysTaskManager.h.

enum SYS_InitStatus_t

Possible results of system's initialization.

Enumerator:
INIT_SUCCES 

Initialization is a success.

RF_NOT_RESPOND 

Radio has not responded.

Definition at line 47 of file sysTaskManager.h.

Function Documentation

void APL_TaskHandler ( void  )

This function is called to process a user application task. The function should be defined in the user application. Its very first call is intended just for setting stack parameters. For starting a network a new task should be posted.

INLINE void SYS_DisableTask ( SYS_TaskId_t  taskId)

Disables specified task.

Parameters:
[in]taskId- task to be disabled.

Definition at line 145 of file sysTaskManager.h.

INLINE void SYS_EnableTask ( SYS_TaskId_t  taskId)

Enables specified task.

Parameters:
[in]taskId- task to be enabled.
